Name: Easyspeak Pre Prohibition Lager
Description:
Pale, crisp, sessionable. Reminiscent of a Pre-prohibition Pilsner, 
this light colored lager is made with 20% 
corn and Motueka hops.

Name: Hike On Helles Lager
Description: A classic German Munich Lager. Light body and delicate bready backbone married with a rounded noble hop character.

Name: Progress English Brown
Description: A traditional malty english style bitter with Progress hops.

Name: Pigtown Pride Porter
Description: A mighty complex and robust American porter that is finished with late boil addition Cascade hops that we love. Notes of chocolate and roasted malt.

Name: Camden Copper Ale
Description: An ode to our vibrant baseball community. Carmel/malty backbone that is complemented by a subtle grapefruit resin hop character from the kettle whirlpool addition.

Name: Hopwalker Double Dry Hopped IPA
Description: American IPA/60 IBU - Copious amounts of Cascsde, Chinook and CTZ hops provide a healthy dose of citrus, melon and pine.

Name: 912 Pale Ale
Description: 24 IBU - A soft and crushable malt bill. A healthy amount of resin, citrus and dank notes. Simcoe, Amarillo and Cascade.

Name: Golden Wisp Hefeweizen
Description: Traditional Hefeweizen made with 60% wheat malt. Notes of banana, citrus, orange and clove.

Name: Moonlight Schwarzbier
Description: A classic smooth dark lager with slight roast

Name: Calm Morning Breakfast Stout
Description: Collaboration with The Stoop Coffee shop. Copious amounts of Ethiopian and Dominican coffee with cocoa and chocolate

Name: Ay, Diablo Dark Mexican Lager
Description: Collab with Mobtown Brewing - Slight roast flavors balanced by corn sweetness and hints of chocolate.

Name: Arnold Palmer (NA)
Description: Our house made NA offering made with fresh squeezed lemons, black tea, honey and local mint.
